domain.systems

Class Wave

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.systems.Wave

  • public class Wave
extends java.lang.Object
    This creates the waves for the game and destroys it as the player interacts with various controls.

    Mainly spawn in the number of fragments and then continues to keep track of said numbers.
    See Also:
    SystemsController, Laser, Net, Control

    • Method Detail

      • createWave

        static void createWave()
        Create the wave. This will use in-built formulas based on the numberOfWaves to compute the amount of fragments to create.
        See Also:
        ResourcesController.setWaveTime(long)
